detectors.description: BatchOffsets.getShuffledId(uint256) (contracts/BatchOffsets.sol#103-110) uses a weak PRNG: offsets[_batch].seed == 0 (contracts/BatchOffsets.sol#105)

BatchOffsets._setBatchOffset(uint256,uint256) (contracts/BatchOffsets.sol#53-95) uses a weak PRNG: takenWord & mask != mask (contracts/BatchOffsets.sol#82)

MPL._getPredictableRandom(uint256) (contracts/MPL.sol#307-309) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(blockhash(uint256)(block.number - 1),_seed,msg.sender,address(this)))) (contracts/MPL.sol#308)
